title: Angular Extract libraries
description: Generates libraries for a specific Avrio's app scope.

name.description: The name of the project this libraries belong to. If none given then the libraries are added to the the shared scope.

x-prompt.message: What is the name of the project you want to Extract?

namespace.description: The namespace of the Library. Normally matches the project name.
namespace.x-prompt: What namespace would you like to use for the Libraries?

tags.description: The list of tags the libraries are allowed to use.
tags.x-prompt: Enter the set of tags that determine the boundaries of the libraries, delimited by comma. You can check the available list of tags in .eslintrc file. Ex: scope:shared.

prefix.description: The prefix to apply to the generated libraries.
